LanguageData.SrDescriptionShuffleLumpSize: This will randomize the size of the veins, and you will have a chance to see a large piece of gold ore, but it is out of reality.
LanguageData.SrDescriptionSurfaceMultiplier: The multiplier of the chance of producing ore on the surface
LanguageData.SrDescriptionUndergroundMultiplier: The multiplier of the chance of producing ore in the underground
LanguageData.SrDescriptionOutpostMapSize: Size in map of mining post
LanguageData.SrDescriptionMaxOutpostCount: Max number of mining posts owned by colonists
